subtitle.Text: Steve: The Goodfellow High School jacket and logo generally is a reference to the logo for Minerva’s Den, the section of Rapture that that DLC takes place in, that we worked on together,
but we didn’t want to make it look exactly like the owl logo from that game. We wanted it to be, you know, an homage or a reference or whatever.
Karla: Yeah, so we decided that since this was a Pacific Northwest school and town and setting that we would go for some Native style representation, and let's see...
Steve: Well, actually we were struggling with it for a little while because we wanted - at first I was saying just make it look like a very '90s-looking school mascot logo illustration

that's just cheap that maybe one of the students did or something, and the direction wasn't good enough and we didn't really have a good enough example to work from and then Kate actually came to visit -
Steve: - and she suggested, oh what if it's like a Pacific Northwest Native American style approach, and that really just clicked and made total sense.
